name: zod-clone
description: Generates deeply cloned definitions of Zod schemas.

scripts.publish-npm: tsc --outDir ./dist && (cp package.json ./dist || xcopy package.json dist /Y) && (cp README.md ./dist || xcopy README.md dist /Y) && (cp LICENSE ./dist || xcopy LICENSE dist /Y) && cd ./dist && npm publish && cd ..

author: Marko Calasan
